content.rendered:
Experience our

Indoor Party Hall

Introduction of Indoor Party Hall

Kings Club Indoor Banquet hall is a synonym with high-class banqueting facilities with scrumptious food and fine dining. It is famous for great service & congenial ambiance with multi-cuisine menus. Kings Club Indoor Banquet with plentiful space set out a significant venue for hosting any event in refined surroundings, blessed with heavenly aromas.
We have a professional team of expert management and sincere staff that take care of each detail in your event from decoration to food, from welcoming to sitting arrangement. They take care of all the arrangements so that you have nothing to worry about and can have enjoyment with your friends and family. Our innovative & contemporary style of background makes it a perfect place to have all your celebrations organized in the most magnificent way.

Features, Amenities & Benefits

Kings Club Indoor Banquet hall serves everything you want and fulfills every aspect of a perfect location for conducting any occasion. We provide a modish & classic Banquet hall that has wonderful lighting and state-of-the-art decor to match the elegance & sophistication of your celebration. We possess a great service staff to create a welcoming ambiance.
Your guests will be impressed by the innovative & gorgeous decoration combined with the excellent hospitality by our experienced team. You will have all facilities at Kings Club Indoor Banquet hall such as basic power, electricity, and backup, valet parking, furniture, to ensure that all your celebration events proceed without any hassle.
A dance workout is fun & also provides several health benefits. Here is a list of health benefits of joining a fitness dance class:
  • It improves your muscle tone and strength.
  • It improves your reflexes & makes your body agile
  • Cardio dance workout improves your aerobic metabolism.
  • It assists in improving your spatial awareness and body balance.
  • Dance strengthens muscles and improves motor fitness.
  • Performing cardio dance on a daily basis can assist you in maintaining your blood pressure.

Overview A/c Party Hall

Air Conditioned

A/c Functional Sq.ft 3000
Non A/c Dining Hall Sq.ft 4000

Capacity

Theatre Style 200

Dining Hall Capacity

200

Car Parking Lot

200

Ac Room Count

14

Two Wheeler Parking

200

Seating Arrangements

  • Theater Style
  • U Shape
  • Cluster Seating
  • Classroom
  • Hollow Square
  • Board room

Kings Club
Catering Service

Kings Club Indoor Banquet hall has its own catering services served by top-notch Chefs that provide a first-class gourmet food experience to make your event special. We serve vegetarian as well as non-vegetarian cuisines.
We have amazing menu packages to cater to varying budgets & groups of all sizes at affordable prices. Our catering services serve from a small casual gathering to a lavish party, from preparation to presentation and from buffets to complete formal sit-down meals that are tempting.

We Provide

  • Vegetarian Food
  • Non Veg Food
  • Beverages
Get Started

Social Events

You can perform several types of dance workouts to become a dance fit. Here is a list of the type of fitness dance classes:

Wedding

Engagement

Birthdays

Corporate Events

Additional Services

Amenities

  • Air Conditioned
  • Power Backup
  • Kitchen
  • Restroom
  • Sound System
  • Mike

Services

  • Purohit
  • Photographer
  • Videographer
  • Florist
  • Choreographer
  • Astrologer
  • Lighting
  • Orchestra
  • Security Guard
  • Has Own Decorator
  • Hawan Allowed
  • Baraat Allowed
  • Firecrackers Allowed
  • Service Hours till 12:00 pm

No Restrictions on

  • Smoking
  • Alcohol
  • Outside Alcohol
  • Loud Music
  • External Decorator Allowed
  • Firecrackers Allowed
  • Hawan Allowed
  • Baraat Allowed

Catering Service

Kings Club Outdoor Banquet hall has its own catering services served by top-notch Chefs that provide a first-class gourmet food experience to make your event special. We serve vegetarian as well as non-vegetarian cuisines.
We have amazing menu packages to cater to varying budgets & groups of all sizes at affordable prices. Our catering services serve from a small casual gathering to a lavish party, from preparation to presentation and from buffets to complete formal sit-down meals that are tempting.

Menu

Kings Club Indoor Banquets serves multi-cuisine menus with mouth-watering desserts, crunchy snacks, and palatable juices. We are specialize in Arabian, Italian, Malabar, Continental, Indian, Chinese and Indian delicacies cooked with exclusive spices, blended & prepared in hygienic surroundings and served with great pride. You will find vegetarian, non-vegetarian dishes along with other opulent sweet treats.

Gallery

What Customers Are Saying About Us
We pride ourselves on what
our happy clients say.

I have celebrated my birthday at the Kings Club Banquet Hall, Indoor A/c Banquet for the this year! I have celebrated other family and friend functions at this location and my family only plans their events at Kings Club! Thank you for making our events so special. You food is great, your service is the best and your hall is beautiful!

Krishna Prasad

I had my engagement party at Kings Club and let me tell you everybody fell in love with the hall. The food was delicious, the service was outstanding, and the decor was so lush and elegant. People will not stop telling me how gorgeous everything was. Thank you Kings Club team for making my occasion so beautiful and fun!!!! I will definitely be having more parties here to come!!!

Mandeep & Vinutha

Being one of the first receptions in a brand new banquet hall, I had my reservations. Will it be ready in time, how will it look like, what would the food taste like. Needless to say that the night was perfect, the hall looks elegant and spectacular. The service was great and the food was awesome. Thanks for contributing to a very memorable night.

Shloka & Karan

Our Partners

Kings Club fitness dance class is approved by Government, some specific sports council, & sports associations.

FAQ

1. Do Banquet Hall prices include decoration cost?
Yes
2. What is the starting menu price/plate/buffet at Kings Club Banquet?
For more details call or Manager for best deals
3. How soon should we book Banquet halls at Kings Club?
Whenever you wish to conduct any event or occasion
4. What are the facilities available in Kings Club Banquet Hall?
Lot of facilities for Members and Non-Members
